title: B2 Cambridge Use of English - Multiple Choice

sentences.q: The _______ from the gate to the cottage was overgrown with weeds.
The field was surrounded by _______ wire.
He has just been _______ to Senior Clerk.
The football match resulted in a _______.
Paul Black is _______ as Labour MP for Brightford in the next election.
My boss insists on seeing everything in _______ before he makes a decision.
How _______ is it from here to the city centre?
I don't understand why people put _______ with the bad service in this restaurant.
Do you think there's any _______ of him passing the exam?
Our school doesn't break _______ until the end of July.
When he was studying he stayed at a student _______ in London.
Do _______ if you come to London.
The _______ from the explosion broke every window in the street.
To _______ the truth I don't really understand computers.
I had to have two _______ when I went to the dentist last week.
Mrs Jones has offered a _______ for the return of her lost cat.
I phoned him this morning but when I said who I was he _______.
Pass me the salad _______ please.
You'll find his number in the telephone _______.
Those prawns we had for supper have given me _______.
I don't think he's the sort of man who will ever _______ much money.
He's _______ First Certificate next June.
We were the _______ students in the class who could speak Spanish.
What are you going to do when you _______ school?
When he died he left _______ amounting to Â£50,000.
I was just _______ to go out when you telephoned.
You will become ill _______ you stop working so hard.
When he heard the terrible noise he asked me what was _______ on.
I don't think that red dress _______ her.
The three friends all _______ for the same job.
She remembered the correct address only _______ she had posted the letter.
It's difficult to pay one's bills when prices keep _______.
The dentist told him to open his mouth _______.
The wild animal _______ savagely at the piece of meat.
At the interview for the job, he gave _______ of himself.
Gavin was a very lively child, always full of _______.
Because he connected the plug up properly, he still got an electric shock.
In the old days, curtains were hung over doors to keep out _______.
On January 1st many people make a New Year _______.
He had many regrets when he _______ his life.
When you are driving along the streets, you must be _______ not to go in a bus lane.
There's _______ in trying to contact him as he's touring Europe.
She made no attempt _______ the problem.
The government was forced to _______ the wishes of the people.
_______ allowing for his age, he still acts very immaturely.
He was very modest and _______ his part in the rescue.
The child began to cry and tears slowly _______ down her face.
It is against the _______ not to wear seat belts in a car.
All those old houses in Church Street are being pulled _______.
I have just _______ an account with the Great Eastern Bank.
There was a _______ failure on the underground this morning.
The fishermen were _______ the sinking boat by helicopter.
I don't think those curtains _______ very well with the wallpaper.
The central heating doesn't seem to be _______ properly.
In recent years inflation has almost doubled the _______ of living.
Johnny's parents always let him have his own _______.
He _______ before I had time to tell him my name.
I heard the news _______ the radio last night.
I'm afraid Mr Brown isn't in. Would you like to _______ a message?
The residents are organising a protest _______ against the closing of their local hospital.
I arrived at the cinema early _______ as to get the best seat.
You _______ really want to go for a swim when there is ice on the pool!
I've searched for my diary everywhere! I hope it will _______ up.
Elizabeth _______ better hurry up if she wants to get the last bus.
She got a good _______ when she bought the bicycle.
My grandfather used to _______ a short walk every day before lunch.
You only qualify _______ entry to the race if you have passed the advanced Driving.
She suggested _______ the coal fire with a modern electric one.
That old saucepan will come in _______ when we go camping.
I could hardly hear the lecturer because she spoke with such a _______ voice.
He has lost weight _______ walking to work every day.
The bank manager agreed to give me a generous _______ to buy a car.
Last year there were fewer road accidents, but now the number is _______ again.
_______ reporting the theft to the police, there is not much you can do.
When he was interviewed, he _______ that he had ever seen the woman before.
Many now think that the revolution _______ nothing.
I would rather you _______ more respect!
I don't know what you're getting _______ - say exactly what you mean.
Your best suit needs _______ before Catherine's wedding.
When I am nervous, I have trouble getting my ideas _______.
Has the post come yet, by any _______?
We were instructed to finish the project without further _______.
I can't let you take your holiday at the busiest time of the year. It's out of _______.
We couldn't go swimming because the whole family _______ with colds.
I am not surprised! I always knew he was capable _______ great things.
They are unlikely _______ the price of those goods before the end of the season.
My father's health had got _______ better with the doctor's new treatment.
When I was at school, we had to learn _______ the names of all the kings.
_______ this beach is almost empty: that's when I like it best.
He couldn't go swimming because the whole family _______ with cold.
She always _______ the crossword in the paper before breakfast.
When she refused to pay her bill, the gas supply to her flat was cut _______.
His wife agreed to _______ him her car while they were away on holiday.
Several items of _______ were found on the river bank.
She had no _______ of selling the clock -- it had belonged to her grandfather.
The lake contained _______ thousands of fish.
Cut the cake into six _______ pieces.
You can use my bicycle _______ you bring it back tomorrow.
My brother always _______ at cards. No wonder he won every game!
He was so tired he wasn't capable _______ driving himself home.
Fill in the form as indicated and return in the envelope _______.
If we hurry, we might get there _______ to catch the early train.
Our neighbours are very _______ on camping holidays.
The mosquito bite made my eyelid _______ and I couldn't open my eyes properly.
I had to wear _______ uniform when I worked in the hotel.
I tried to _______ them from going, but they wouldn't take notice.
The doctor advised me not to take _______ so much work in the future.
If he phones, _______ him to buy some potatoes on the way home.

The _______ of the murderer lasted six weeks.
A chicken can _______ up to three eggs a day.
The nurse was on _______ in the hospital all night.
I suggest we _______ outside the cinema tomorrow at 8.30.
_______ playing professional basketball, she also enjoys tennis.
She _______ him of lying to her.
The child was told to eat all his vegetables or _______ he would get no ice-cream.
_______ you have no key, you will have to get back before I go out.
The question of late payment of bill was _______ again at the board meeting.
_______ the time you get to the theatre, the play will have finished.
Since my mother died, my closest _______ is my cousin.
James should have stayed out of the sun as his skin is so _______.
Have you any objections _______ this new road scheme.
To get a passport, you must send in your birth _______ and two photos.
The job was more difficult than I _______ expected it to be.
She wrapped the small parcel in a paper and tied it with _______.
He just couldn't open the jar _______ hard he tried.
Their washing-machine was out of _______ so they couldn't wash my clothes.
Could you _______ me how to use this new telephone?
His father's health was a terrible shock and took him a long time to _______ it.
They'd like to move to New York, but their children never agree _______.
When she looked into her purse she found she had been _______.
I have told him never _______ here again.
A good friend will _______ you when you are having problems.
The fruit tasted _______ sweet, rather.
Her car is outside so I suppose she _______ have arrived.
My sister is an expert on wildlife and its _______.
After many attempts, he finally _______ to pass his driving test.
Over the last few years, the birth _______ in this country has fallen dramatically.
Thousands of people were thought _______ paying the tax last year.
The teacher objected to the students _______ gum in class.
He spoke so quickly that _______ people understood him.
I find translation app more nuisance than a _______ when learning another language.
When was your company taken _______ by 'Global Cars'?
